      • asParameterString

        public static java.lang.String asParameterString(java.util.List<javax.faces.component.UIParameter> children)
        Return the name value pairs parameters as a ANSI escaped string formatted in query string parameter format for ice.s or ice.se calls for f:param support
        Parameters:
        children - List of children
        Returns:
        a String in the form function(p){name1,value1,name2,value2...});
